entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
